bibdata.title: Standard for Minimum Performance Characteristics of IEEE P802.20 Terminals and Base Stations/Access Nodes
Standard for Minimum Performance Characteristics of IEEE P802.20 Terminals and Base Stations/Access Nodes
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.20.3/D2.1, Jul 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard details definitions, method of measurements and minimum performance characteristics for IEEE P802.20 MBWA terminals and base stations/Access Nodes (AN). The test methods are specified in this document; however, methods other than those specified may suffice for the same purpose.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
